Name: Min Bolt Pretension A325
Description: Minimum pretension for A325 high-strength bolts

Name: Min Bolt Pretension A490
Description: Minimum pretension for A490 high-strength bolts

Name: Min Bolt Spacing
Description: Minimum bolt spacing centre-to-centre

Name: Min Edge Distance
Description: Minimum edge distance from bolt centre to plate edge

Name: Max Bolt Spacing
Description: Maximum bolt spacing to prevent corrosion ingress

Name: Max Edge Distance
Description: Maximum edge distance sheared elements

Name: Min Fillet Weld Size
Description: Minimum fillet weld leg size based on thicker joined part

Name: Max Fillet Weld Size
Description: Max fillet weld leg at edge of rolled member or plate

Name: Min Effective Throat
Description: Effective throat of fillet weld = 0.707 × leg

Name: Shear Strength Nominal Bolt
Description: Nominal shear strength of bolt group Rn = Fnv × Ab

Name: Bearing Strength at Bolt Holes
Description: Nominal bearing strength Rn = 2.4 d t Fu

Name: Tear-Out Strength at Bolt Holes
Description: Nominal tear-out Rn = 1.2 Lc t Fu

Name: Min Base Plate Area
Description: Base plate must distribute column load to concrete

Name: Min Anchor Bolt Embedment
Description: Min embedment depth for cast-in J or L anchors

Name: Min Anchor Bolt Edge Distance
Description: Min concrete edge distance to prevent blow-out

Name: Visual Weld Inspection
Description: All welds shall receive visual inspection per AWS D1.1

Name: Special Inspection Steel Conn
Description: Special inspection required for bolted / welded connections

Name: Steel Connection Fire Rating
Description: Structural steel connections in fire-rated assemblies need 2hr min

Name: Min Bolt Spacing Parallel
Description: Min spacing between bolts parallel to grain

Name: Min Bolt Spacing Perp
Description: Min spacing between bolts perpendicular to grain

Name: Min Edge Distance Parallel
Description: Min end distance parallel to grain loaded end

Name: Min Edge Distance Perp
Description: Min edge distance perpendicular to grain

Name: Min Lag Screw Spacing
Description: Min spacing lag screws parallel to grain

Name: Min Lag Screw Penetration
Description: Min penetration of lag screw into main member

Name: Manufacturer Evaluation Report
Description: All proprietary connectors require valid ICC-ES ESR

Name: Ledger Board Fastener Spacing
Description: Ledger fasteners max centre-to-centre spacing 600mm

Name: Ledger Board Min Embedment
Description: Ledger bolts into concrete or masonry require min embedment

Name: Hold-Down Location
Description: Hold-downs required at each end of every shear wall

Name: Shear Wall Nail Spacing
Description: Min common-nail spacing at shear-wall panel edges

Name: Dowel Bearing Strength
Description: Dowel bearing strength Fe' = Fe* × CD × CM × Ct

Name: Wood Connection Fire Rating
Description: Wood connections in 1hr fire-rated assemblies must maintain rating

Name: Connector Corrosion
Description: Galvanised connectors required when CMC > 19%

Name: Anchor Bolt Concrete Strength
Description: Concrete around anchor bolts min f'c 21 MPa

Name: Anchor Bolt Group Capacity
Description: Anchor group capacity must exceed factored uplift

Name: Mudsill Anchor Spacing
Description: Max spacing of mudsill anchor bolts 1830mm

Name: Mudsill Anchor At Corners
Description: Anchor bolt within 300mm of each end of sill plate

Name: Epoxy Anchor Cure Time
Description: Epoxy anchor adhesive must fully cure before loading

Name: Seismic Anchor Capacity
Description: Seismic uplift at anchor requires 1.5× design force capacity

Name: Elongation Liquid Membrane
Description: Liquid-applied membrane min elongation at break

Name: Tensile Liquid Membrane
Description: Liquid-applied membrane min tensile strength

Name: Sheet Membrane Elongation
Description: Thermoplastic sheet membrane elongation at break

Name: Modified Bitumen Properties
Description: SBS / APP mod-bitumen sheet min properties per spec

Name: Sealant Joint Movement
Description: Sealant rated movement capacity must exceed joint movement

Name: Sealant Single-Sided
Description: Single-sided sealant joint requires backer rod

Name: Below-Grade Membrane Thickness
Description: Below-grade waterproofing min 1.5mm dry-film thickness

Name: Drain Board Required
Description: Drain board or equivalent required over below-grade membrane

Name: Bentonite Hydration Protect
Description: Bentonite clay must be protected from premature hydration

Name: Foundation Waterproofing Req
Description: Foundations below grade in permeated soil must be waterproofed

Name: Sealant UV Exposure
Description: Sealants exposed to UV must be UV-rated or covered

Name: Roof Membrane R-Value
Description: Below-roof waterproofing layer thermal resistance not counted in R

Name: UK Liquid Membrane Standard
Description: UK EN 13707 polyurethane membrane compliance

Name: UK Sheet Membrane Standard
Description: UK EN 13969 sheet waterproofing compliance

Name: Window Head Flashing Required
Description: Head flashing required above all exterior openings

Name: Door Sill Flashing Required
Description: Sill pan flashing required at all exterior door thresholds

Name: Ext Wall Vert Joints
Description: Vertical joints in exterior cladding require flashing or sealant

Name: Roof Valley Flashing
Description: Valley flashing min 600mm wide centred on valley

Name: Step Flashing Min Leg
Description: Step flashing perpendicular leg min 100mm up wall

Name: Counter Flashing Overlap
Description: Counter flashing overlap onto base flashing min 38mm

Name: Roof-Wall Junction Flashing
Description: Flashing required at every roof-to-wall junction

Name: Vent Pipe Flashing
Description: Vent pipe penetrations shall have flashing or boot

Name: Flashing Material Compat
Description: Flashing metals must be galvanically compatible or separated

Name: Expansion Joint Movement
Description: Expansion joint cover must allow design movement ±25%

Name: UK Aluminium Flashing
Description: EN 1688 aluminium products for building applications

Name: UK Lead Sheet
Description: EN 1468 lead sheet for building applications
